contents.title: Getting Started
contents.description: Press your mind gracefully, which is powered by nuxt.js 3.0 and nuxt.js content 2.0.

children.value: Press your mind gracefully, which is powered by nuxt.js 3.0 and nuxt.js content 2.0.
Make sure to install the dependencies:

props.code:
# yarn
yarn install

# npm
npm install

# pnpm
pnpm install --shamefully-hoist

children.value: html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}

contents.title: SSG：Static Mode
contents.description: SSG Mode is static page mode. All pages are genereated by nuxt 3. And, thid site can be deploy at nginx static page server.

children.value: SSG Mode is static page mode. All pages are genereated by nuxt 3. And, thid site can be deploy at nginx static page server.
